values:
Oh man.

I miss you so much.

I cant even begin to move on.

This is bullshit.

Complete bullshit.

I hate every single one of you guys for not fucking being there. I really fucking appreciate it.

Fuck this.

I'm trying to get rid of my dog. Most of you have met her, some of you havent. For those of you that havent shes a 2 year old huskey mix. I think she has random lab thrown in there. All white with a little bit of gray around the eyes. Sweet as fucking anything. Please someone take her and love her. She at least deserves that much.

I leave her alone too much, I think.

As for the issue of yesterdays post I decided to just grow up and move on. And by move on I mean avoid relationships at all costs. Ha. But, really. Theres no point in being bitter or dumb about any of it. I guess I just need to realize that I'm not meant to be with anyone. Ever.

Now. All you mother fuckers need to give me a call sometime soon. I'm missing you. 

Thank you for your time. The end.

Dear Tony,

You have squinty eyes and terrible acne scars. Your face is just generally ugly, but I love your hair. Thats all.

                                               Love,
                                                   Tom.
